timeline.message:
Specific KafkaMessage instead of wrapping ConsumerRecord as a payload

Signed-off-by: Daniel Kec <daniel.kec@oracle.com>

timeline.bodyText: as other methods show that consumerRecord is nullable, this would end with a NPE
timeline.author: tomas-langer

replies.bodyText: KafkaConsumerMessage can be created only by us from ConsumerRecord, optional on the interface is ment for KafkaProducerMessage which can be created by user when he uses KafkaMessage#of
replies.author: danielkec

replies.bodyText: added null check to constructor, this.consumerRecord is final
replies.author: danielkec

timeline.author: tomas-langer

timeline.bodyText: Maybe the exception should contain the consumerRecord.getClass().getName() to simplify troubleshooting
timeline.author: tomas-langer
